Question: This person said at the time that she didn't care if she just won "cab fare", and that the lawsuit was a matter of principle.
Hints: That same year, this person's father died of causes related to his alcoholism.
During and after her variety show, this person appeared in many television and film projects.
In 2008, this person had her second role as an animated character, in the film Horton Hears a Who!.
